name: i18next-nextjs-react
description: Demonstrates using dedicated i18next instances in micro frontends, enabling language change in one that affects all.

scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter i18next-nextjs-react_next-host dev" "pnpm --filter i18next-nextjs-react_react-host start:live" "pnpm --filter i18next-nextjs-react_react-remote start:live" "pnpm --filter i18next-shared-lib dev"

author: Frédéric JAMMES
